name: Banana Search
description:
Banana Search!

Not your classic word search.  You only need to find ONE word, BANANA!

Hiden throughout the grid are several BANANAs.  You need to search left, right, up, down, and diagonally to find them all.

Just extract the .7z file to the directory of your choice and double-click the banana.exe file.

Good luck :)
